text: Ezɨ Atrivim Hadateser gumazir maba amangizɨ, me ghua Yufretisɨn Fanemɨn vongɨn aruem anadi naghɨn otogha, Sirian mɨdorozir gumaziba inigha ghua bar Helamɨn nguibar ekiamɨn me akufa. Ezɨ Atrivim Hadateserɨn mɨdorozir gumazibar garir gumazir dapanim Sobak, men faragha ghua men gumazir dapanimɨn iti.
